price: 31. Sidaasaan ugu yeellay Nabi walba cadow ka mid ah denbiilayaasha. Kuna filan Rabbigaa Hanuuniye iyo Hiilliye uu ahaado.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوّٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيٗا وَنَصِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika jaʿalnā likulli nabiyyin ʿaduwwan mina al-muj'rimīna wakafā birabbika hādiyan wanaṣīran
